description: This file defines a Mongoose schema and model for products in an e-commerce backend. It includes the schema for product variants and main product details, with indexing for search and references to other collections.

classes.name: VariantSchema
classes.description: Schema for product variants, including SKU, attributes, price, MRP, and stock.

classes.name: ProductSchema
classes.description: Schema for main product details, including title, description, category, brand, tags, pricing, stock, variants, ratings, and timestamps.

methods.name: mongoose.model
methods.description: Creates and exports the Product model based on the ProductSchema.
